summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. B-151, for the improvement of North Street (now West 64th Street) from the west line of 3rd Avenue (now 22nd Avenue Northwest) to 6th Avenue (now 28th Avenue Northwest) by constructing a sewer therein, with all necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 1220 of the former City of Ballard and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
